articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Quebec City, Quebec

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will join Her Excellency the Right Honourable Mary Simon, Governor General of Canada, to welcome His Holiness Pope Francis to the Citadelle of Quebec and deliver remarks.

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will have an audience with His Holiness Pope Francis and meet with the Secretary of State of the Holy See, Cardinal Pietro Parolin.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting
